Use of English.question: Choose the option nearest in meaning to the underlined word: The man’s story gave us an inkling of what he had passed through.
Use of English.explanation: An 'inkling' means a slight knowledge or suspicion; a hint.

Use of English.question: Choose the word opposite in meaning to the underlined word: The testimony of the witness was vague.
Use of English.explanation: Vague means unclear; the opposite is clear.

Physics.question: A body of mass 2 kg moving with velocity 3 m/s collides with another body of mass 5 kg at rest. If they move together after collision, their common velocity is
Physics.explanation: Conservation of momentum: m₁u₁ + m₂u₂ = (m₁+m₂)v → 2×3 + 5×0 = 7v → v = 6/7 ≈ 0.86 m/s

CRS.question: Jesus wept over Jerusalem because
options: A. He was disappointed with the people
B. He knew He would die there
C. the people did not believe in Him
